recently_narrative: The most significant operational pattern observed is the increasing reliance on AI-powered features and the potential instability they introduce, as evidenced by the multiple service incidents and the announcement of new AI capabilities. This suggests that Zendesk administrators need to carefully monitor the performance and impact of AI-driven features, thoroughly test them in staging environments, and be prepared to quickly respond to any service disruptions that may arise from the deployment of these advanced technologies.

release_notes.summary: Copilot ticket summarization now includes both public replies and internal notes, with an expanded word limit to capture more ticket context. Copilot's real-time AI suggestions for agents during live voice calls provide instant, context-aware recommendations from the help center to help resolve customer issues more efficiently.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-10-10
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Copilot
Voice
App Marketplace
Products with no updates this week
